title: MachineGam
author: MachineGam
content: Loan request Amount: $50 USDTReason for loan: Objective Payment of trading course and operationsRepay date 3 daysRepayment amount: $60 USDTAddress TWzT5Cy1xBQBKtv3u2cAuqB3ZW3f5AETZe

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: MachineGam on January 23, 2023, 05:28:57 AMLoan request Amount: $50 USDTReason for loan: Objective Payment of trading course and operationsRepay date 3 daysRepayment amount: $60 USDTAddress TWzT5Cy1xBQBKtv3u2cAuqB3ZW3f5AETZeI am very surprised to see that you were able to help someone by sending 220$ and now you are asking 50$ loan. Hope there might have a few rich people who may help you out but in the previous history, I have not seen filled such type of loan request except the request where you wanted to help.

comments.author: Yolo89
comments.body: Quote from: MachineGam on January 23, 2023, 05:28:57 AMLoan request Amount: $50 USDTReason for loan: Objective Payment of trading course and operationsRepay date 3 daysRepayment amount: $60 USDTAddress TWzT5Cy1xBQBKtv3u2cAuqB3ZW3f5AETZeI am going to assume he is a scammer as he asked me to send him money earlier prior to giving me a loan. Do not trust.

comments.author: MachineGam
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 23, 2023, 06:01:14 AMQuote from: MachineGam on January 23, 2023, 05:28:57 AMLoan request Amount: $50 USDTReason for loan: Objective Payment of trading course and operationsRepay date 3 daysRepayment amount: $60 USDTAddress TWzT5Cy1xBQBKtv3u2cAuqB3ZW3f5AETZeI am very surprised to see that you were able to help someone by sending 220$ and now you are asking 50$ loan. Hope there might have a few rich people who may help you out but in the previous history, I have not seen filled such type of loan request except the request where you wanted to help. Well, really, if I have the need to return, let's see if that guy is going to return it, because I doubt it, someone like new will return it

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: In another thread, you accuse a member of attempting to scam you in an exchange of your BTC for fiat, but here you claim that you don't have adequate collateral for the loan. It is clear that you are being dishonest in one of these two situations.The Rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" - IGNORE AT YOUR OWN RISK!Quote from: DiamondCardz on April 20, 2014, 02:40:54 PMIf you completely ignore this sticky and make a loan request with no collateral, without having massive trust on the forum, the chances of you getting negative trusted feedback and therefore having a Trade with Extreme Caution tag is almost 100%.
